content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, swim, and run track.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to play video games too. What are some of your favorites?
I love playing Mario Kart, Super Smash Bros., and Minecraft.
Those are all great games! I love Mario Kart too.
I also like to swim and run track. I've been swimming since I was a little kid, and I've been running track for the past three years.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to swim, but I'm afraid of the water.
You should definitely learn! It's a great way to stay active and it's a lot of fun.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to get in the water, though.
You'll be fine! Just take it slow and don't worry about drowning.
Thanks for the advice! I'll let you know how it goes.
No problem! I'm sure you'll do great.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a doctor. I've always been fascinated by the human body and I want to help people.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll make a great doctor.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
So, what do you like about Canada?
I love the scenery. The mountains are beautiful and the lakes are so clear.
I've heard good things about Canada. I've never been there, but I'd love to visit one day.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll put it on my list of places to visit.
